Batch Brewing Company

Contact

Beer Review

Quite a few gems in an ever expanding and improving range. They'll rarely let you down

Venue Review

The largest of the Marrickville breweries, Batch often draws a crowd on weekends. Decorated with old couches and wooden pallets it has a very relaxed feel.

Opening Hours

Tuesday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM

Wednesday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM

Thursday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM

Friday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM

Sunday: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM
